attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recent studies have shown that 800,000 people have had to give up their much needed medication as they can longer afford to take it!  This leaves no question as to why 20% of GPs break the law to ensure that their patients can have their prescriptions and 6% of GPs have paid for their patients prescriptions themselves!
The NHS was funded on the principle that healthcare is free at the point of use- not free if you have your £7.20per item.
It has been evidenced that it will cost £46m to scrap the scheme but this would be offset by savings in emergency care and admissions!
I am sure that it Wales and Scotland can do this successfully there is no reason why England cannot follow suit!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to make prescriptions free for all.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=prescription1


Her Majesty's Government
